auth.loginToAccess: Please log in to access this page

auth.benefitExperience: Personalized experience based on your preferences

auth.sign_in_description: Access your account to manage your vehicle listings, saved searches, and connect with sellers.
auth.createAccountDescription: Create an account to start buying and selling vehicles on our marketplace.
auth.pleaseVerifyFirst: Please verify your device before signing up
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.formError: Please correct the errors in the form

auth.authVerificationText: We use security verification to ensure your account is protected

listings.pageDescription: Browse our selection of quality vehicles
listings.notFoundDescription: The listing you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
listings.searchPlaceholder: Search by make, model, or keywords
listings.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Toyota Camry 2020 in excellent condition
listings.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide detailed information about your vehicle
listings.locationPlaceholder: e.g., Dubai Marina, Sheikh Zayed Road
listings.listingDurationDesc: Your listing will be active for the selected period. You can renew it before it expires.
listings.expiredListingsAlert: You have {{count}} expired listing(s) that need attention
listings.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this listing? This action cannot be undone.
listings.confirmBulkDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the selected listings? This action cannot be undone.
listings.viewsTooltip: Number of times your listing was viewed by users
listings.title: Title

settings.pushNotificationsDesc: Receive push notifications on your device
settings.showPhoneDesc: Display your phone number on your listings
settings.showEmailDesc: Display your email address on your listings
settings.analyticsDesc: Help us improve by allowing data collection
settings.deleteAccountDesc: Once deleted, your account cannot be recovered

contact.title: Contact Us
